resources.string: Press the button below and turn phones speaker to the object to which you want to measure the distance. Wait around 5 seconds before the measure is done.
This is application which allows you to measure distance using your mobile device as your personal meter. Using is simple:
1. Point your mobile device loudspeaker to the object.
2. It is recommended to put your hand approximately ten centimeters under the device to shield the reflection from the floor.
3. Keep your device in stable position and press the button: Measure Distance
4. After the sound finish playing, the calculation of distance is in progress.
5. When the distance is calculated, it is shown in upper part of screen.
Recommendation: To shield against unwanted reflections from other directions, put an object like hand or your whole body approximately 30 centimeters from your mobile device in this direction.
